reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

description.narrative: Provision of rainwater harvesting spouting and tanks for public buildings in South Tarawa and Kiritimati, and rehabilitation of water and sanitation at the two hospitals in South Tarawa. Forecast NZ$2.7m in 2014/15.
